languages.text: "Что поделать. Знать помыслы верных слуг {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} — моя работа".

traits.locale_text: "Что поделать. Знать помыслы верных слуг Империума — моя работа".

languages.text: "I can't help it. It is my job to know the thoughts of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s faithful."

languages.text: 「仕方が無い。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の信徒の思想を知るのが私の仕事だ」
languages.original_text: "I can't help it. It is my job to know the thoughts of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s faithful."

traits.locale_text: 「仕方が無い。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の信徒の思想を知るのが私の仕事だ」

languages.text: “我也没办法，了解{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}信徒们的想法是我的职责所在。”
languages.original_text: "I can't help it. It is my job to know the thoughts of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s faithful."

traits.locale_text: “我也没办法，了解{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}信徒们的想法是我的职责所在。”

languages.text: «No puedo evitarlo. Me dedico a conocer las opiniones de los fieles del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
languages.original_text: "I can't help it. It is my job to know the thoughts of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s faithful."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo evitarlo. Me dedico a conocer las opiniones de los fieles del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».

languages.text: « C'est plus fort que moi. Il est de mon devoir de connaître les pensées des fidèles de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "I can't help it. It is my job to know the thoughts of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s faithful."

traits.locale_text: « C'est plus fort que moi. Il est de mon devoir de connaître les pensées des fidèles de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »

languages.text: "Ich kann nichts dagegen tun. Es ist meine Aufgabe, die Gedanken der Gläubigen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu kennen."
languages.original_text: "I can't help it. It is my job to know the thoughts of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann nichts dagegen tun. Es ist meine Aufgabe, die Gedanken der Gläubigen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} zu kennen."

languages.text: "Elimde değil. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} sadık kullarının düşündüklerini öğrenmek benim işim."
